api/overview.title: API Overview
api/overview.description: TTS Wrapper's API is designed to be intuitive and consistent across different TTS engines. This overview will help you understand the main components and their relationships.

guides/basic-usage.title: Basic Usage
guides/basic-usage.description: This guide covers the fundamental operations of TTS Wrapper.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: TTS Wrapper is a powerful Python library that provides a unified interface for working with multiple Text-to-Speech (TTS) services. Whether you're using cloud-based services like AWS Polly, Google Cloud TTS, or local solutions like eSpeak, TTS Wrapper makes it easy to integrate and switch between different TTS engines.
